title: We launched unite
content: Our first partners conference brought together over 700 attendees from around the world.

title: We launched facebook messenger
content: Over 30,000 merchants integrated Facebook Messenger with their store.

title: We launched apple pay
content: Merchants saw conversion rates approximately double by shoppers who have enabled Apple Pay.

title: We launched Gruntwork mobile
content: Over 130,000 merchants used Gruntwork Mobile to set up and run their stores from their mobile phones.

title: Black friday / Cyber monday
content: At our peak, there were over $555,000 USD transactions per minute
